item.title: TransportVehicle
item.author: aaron-zzz@outlook.com (Aaron)
item.description: Outline Our robotcar First we can take a look at what we have made below out of the material around us. The main compents have been marked out as red text, they can be easily bought via internet and assembled by your home tool box. So finally we get this lovely cute robot car. Everything we design for it is included in my github. There’s something I need to point out if someone thoroughly followed our PCB design.
